name: Blessing of the Ancients
messages: {} has been blessed by the Ancients! Their attacks are now more powerful.
The Ancients smile upon {}. Their strength grows immensely!

name: Curse of the Fallen
messages: {} has been cursed by the fallen spirits. Their strength diminishes.
The shadows of the fallen weigh heavy on {}. Their attacks are weakened.

name: Fury of the Storm
messages: The storm rages within {}. Their next strike will be ferocious!
{} channels the fury of the storm, ready to unleash devastation!

name: Betrayal of a Friend
messages: {} feels the sting of betrayal. Their resolve falters.
A friend’s betrayal leaves {} vulnerable, weakening their resolve.

name: Blessing of Speed
messages: {} feels light as a feather, their attacks come swift and true.
The winds favor {}, granting them unmatched speed in combat.

name: Fatigue
messages: {} is overcome by fatigue, their movements slow down.
Exhaustion takes its toll on {}. They struggle to keep up.

name: Divine Protection
messages: A divine force shields {} from harm, boosting their confidence!
{} is surrounded by a radiant aura, bolstering their defenses.

name: Poisoned Blade
messages: {} has been poisoned! Their attacks are less effective.
A toxic venom courses through {}, weakening their strikes.

name: Rage of the Berserker
messages: {} is consumed by berserker rage! Their next attack will be devastating!
The fury of a berserker fills {}. They’re ready to wreak havoc!

name: Misfire
messages: {} fumbles with their weapon, losing precious momentum.
A critical misfire leaves {} vulnerable and off balance.

name: Gift of the Elements
messages: The elements themselves empower {}. Their attacks burn with energy!
{} harnesses the power of the elements, striking with greater force!

name: Haunted by Ghosts
messages: Spirits of the past haunt {}, sapping their strength.
{} is tormented by restless spirits, weakening their resolve.

name: Warrior's Spirit
messages: {} calls upon the warrior’s spirit, their attacks become relentless!
The spirit of a fallen warrior guides {}’s hand, making their strikes more deadly!

name: Echoes of Doubt
messages: Doubt creeps into {}, shaking their confidence.
The echoes of past failures weigh on {}, weakening their resolve.

name: Phoenix's Rebirth
messages: {} rises from the ashes, their strength renewed!
Like a phoenix, {} is reborn, ready to unleash renewed fury!

name: Sapped by Fear
messages: Fear grips {}, sapping their strength.
{} is paralyzed by fear, making their attacks feeble.

name: Blessing of Endurance
messages: {} gains the endurance of a mountain, able to withstand any blow!
Endurance flows through {}, making them nearly unstoppable.

name: Shadow of Death
messages: {} feels the cold grip of death, weakening their spirit.
Death’s shadow looms over {}, draining their vitality.

name: Fortune's Favor
messages: Fortune smiles upon {}, boosting their morale and power!
{} is favored by fortune, making their attacks more effective.

name: Plagued by Nightmares
messages: Nightmares plague {}, causing them to falter in combat.
{} is haunted by terrifying visions, weakening their resolve.
